StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetExamHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonId int
AS SET NOCOUNT ON CREATE TABLE #TEMP( EXAM_NAME VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, EXAM_DATE VARCHAR(20) NULL, EXAM_TYPE VARCHAR(10) NULL, EXAM_SCORE VARCHAR(10) NULL, EXAM_ENTERED_DATE DATETIME NULL, VERSION VARCHAR(10) NULL, AFQT VARCHAR(10) NULL, GT VARCHAR(10) NULL, EL VARCHAR(10) NULL, CL VARCHAR(10) NULL, MM VARCHAR(10) NULL, )
INSERT INTO #TEMP( EXAM_NAME, EXAM_DATE, EXAM_TYPE, EXAM_SCORE, EXAM_ENTERED_DATE ) Select 'Professed', CONVERT(VARCHAR, EXAM_DATE, 106), PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE, EXAM_SCORE, EXAM_ENTERED_DATE FROM CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM Where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonId
INSERT INTO #TEMP( EXAM_NAME, EXAM_DATE, EXAM_TYPE, VERSION, AFQT, GT, EL, CL, MM ) Select 'ASVAB', CONVERT(VARCHAR, ASVAB_DATE, 106), 'ASVAB', VERSION, AFQT_SCORE, GT_SCORE, EL_SCORE, CL_SCORE, MM_SCORE FROM CANDIDATE_ASVAB Where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonId
INSERT INTO #TEMP( EXAM_NAME, EXAM_DATE, EXAM_TYPE, EXAM_SCORE ) Select 'Medical', CONVERT(VARCHAR, MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE, 106), MEDICAL_EXAM_TYPE, MEDICAL_DISPOSITION FROM CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM Where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonId
INSERT INTO #TEMP( EXAM_NAME, EXAM_DATE, EXAM_TYPE, EXAM_SCORE, EXAM_ENTERED_DATE ) Select 'Special', CONVERT(VARCHAR, SPECIAL_EXAM_DATE, 106), SPECIAL_EXAM_TYPE, SPECIAL_EXAM_SCORE, EXAM_ENTERED_DATE FROM CANDIDATE_SPECIAL_EXAM Where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonId
SELECT * FROM #TEMP
